config.option.ignorecantakescreenshot_to: Ignores the "CanTakeScreenshot" check allowing you to take screenshots in circumstances where you normally wouldnâ€™t be able to, like inside cut-scenes.
config.option.scale_tooltip:
Higher number means more pixels, but the file size of the image also increases
This does the same as the "Zoom Level" option in the Stardew Settings.
